modName: Explosive Daedric Arrows of Fire Frost and Shock
summary: Add craftable, explosive Daedric arrows of fire, frost, and shock to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Add craftable, explosive Daedric arrows of fire, frost, and shock to the game.  You will find some examples inside of Breezehome in Whiterun.  Does an area effect damage of 30.

Kill Lydia in all new ways!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SGs281bHn7E
author: Macgyver1958
